short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-on injects JavaScript into atlassian web pages to improve the experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 1.1 currently implements:
1) Allow unchecking all checkboxes on an atlassian wiki page.

Removed features:
1) Version 1.0: Stops page shifting multiple times during the first few seconds of an atlassian wiki page load.
